verbose_text: It is noteworthy that several members of the EGFR downstream singling pathways (XREF_FIG), including PTEN, ribosomal protein S6 kinase beta-1 (S6) and AKT within the PI3K-AKT-mTOR signaling pathway, have been previously reported to be phosphorylated or modulated by CK2.
evidence: EGFR downstream singling pathways ( XREF_FIG ), including PTEN, ribosomal protein S6 kinase beta-1 (S6) and AKT within the PI3K-AKT-mTOR signaling pathway, have been previously reported to be phosphorylated or modulated by CK2
